factory_reset.title: Factory reset the device?
factory_reset.message: This will permanently delete all data from your device and restore it to factory settings. This cannot be undone.
factory_reset.password_hint: The delete password is configured in your FMD Android app. It is not your server password.

lock.title: Lock the device?
lock.message: After the device has been locked, your device PIN or password is required to unlock the device. Biometric unlock won't work until the PIN or password is entered.
lock.message_hint: Enter a message to show on the lockscreen. If you leave this empty, the message that is configured in the FMD Android settings will be shown on the lockscreen instead.

webcrypto_warning.title: WebCrypto API not available
webcrypto_warning.message: FMD Server won't work because the WebCrypto API is not available.
webcrypto_warning.detail: This is most likely because you are visiting this site over insecure HTTP. Please use HTTPS. If you are self-hosting, please read the
